summary: Makes enemies harder adds more diseases, and increases enemy level caps.
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=#00BFFF]Extensively rebalances most enemies in the game, it adds perks to enemies to increase their damage, the scaling is based on enemy level maxing out at 250% ( for example an enemy that would normally hit for 25 would now hit for 87. ) bonus damage, Also increasing almost all enemies starting levels and adding level scaling, this means early game and late game will both be equally affected, it also adds many diseases to enemies and makes old ones much more deadly.

Most if not all combat mods should work with this, as it only affects enemies directly and does not change internal values, if you run into problems with another combat mod contact me and i will try to put a comprehensive list of mods that do and don\'t work with mine![/COLOR]

[COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=Arial Black]This mod will be part of a series of mods to change many of Skyrims balance flaws, the other parts to go with this mod are.[/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#82CAFA][FONT=Arial Black]Crafting Balance Mod[/FONT][/COLOR] [SIZE=5][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21781]Here[/URL][/SIZE]
[COLOR=#82CAFA][FONT=Arial Black]Artifact Balance Mod[/FONT][/COLOR] [SIZE=5][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21779/]Here[/URL][/SIZE]

[COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]ISSUES: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH VANILLA! Dawnguard required, this will not work with other mods that change values of the enemies edited by this mod[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE]

Changelog Version [COLOR=#ffff00]1.0 Beta[/COLOR]

O----------------O
    Release!   
O----------------O

[COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Arial Black]TABLE OF CONTENT, EFFECTS AND CHANGES.[/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#fac08f][FONT=Arial Black]Bandits[/FONT][/COLOR]

Physical Damage: increased at all levels**.
Magic Damage: Increased at all levels.
Level: 3-30*
Disease: Null

[COLOR=#fac08f][FONT=Arial Black]Falmer[/FONT][/COLOR]

Physical Damage: increased at all levels**.
Magic Damage: Null*
Level: 9-55
Disease: Rattles. Greenspore.

[COLOR=#fac08f][FONT=Arial Black]Beasts[/FONT][/COLOR]

Physical Damage: increased at all levels.
Magic Damage: Null
Level: 2-40
Disease: Crimson Plague. Red Death. Ataxia. Rockjoint. Wither. Swamp Fever.

[COLOR=#fac08f][FONT=Arial Black]Monster[/FONT][/COLOR]

Physical Damage: increased at all levels.
Magic Damage: Increased at all levels.
Level: 8-90
Disease: Witbane.

[COLOR=#fac08f][FONT=Arial Black]Undead[/FONT][/COLOR]

Physical Damage: increased at all levels.
Magic Damage: Increased at all levels.
Level: 3-100
Disease: Brown Rot. Chills.

[COLOR=#fac08f][FONT=Arial Black]Dragons[/FONT][/COLOR]

Physical Damage: increased at all levels.
Magic Damage: Increased at all levels.
Level: 20-100
Disease: Null*

And many many more enemies not listed here.

[COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Arial Black]DISEASES.[/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Red Death[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Skeevers*
Symptoms: You will lose Health until you are dead or a cure is found.
Threat Level: 5

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Crimson Plague[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Skeever*
Symptoms: Reduces Health and Stamina by 75 points.
Threat Level: 4

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Swamp Fever[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Mudcrabs.
Symptoms: Reduces Stamina regen by 100%
Threat Level: 4

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Witbane[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Trolls*
Symptoms: Reduces Magicka regen by 100%
Threat Level: 4-†

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Brown Rot[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Skeletons. Draugr.
Symptoms: Reduces One-Handed and Two-Handed skills by 20%. Reduces speech by 25%
Threat Level: 3-†

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Chills[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Skeletons. Draugr. Frostbite Spider.
Symptoms: Reduces Magicka by 50 and Magicka regen by 50%.
Threat Level: 3-†

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Rattles[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Falmer. Chaurus. Wolfs. Traps.
Symptoms: Reduces Stamina by 75 points, and Stamina regen by 50%
Threat Level: 3

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Ataxia[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Falmer. Chaurus. Slaughterfish. Bears. Traps.
Symptoms: Reduces Health by 50 points, and Stamina regen by 50%
Threat Level: 3

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Wither[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Sabre Cats*
Symptoms: Reduces Stamina by 50 points, and Stamina regen by 50%*
Threat Level: 3

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Rockjoint[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Wolfs. Bears. Slaughterfish.
Symptoms: Reduces One-Handed and Two-Handed by 25%
Threat Level: 2

[COLOR=#667C26][FONT=Arial Black]Greenspore[/FONT][/COLOR]

Contraction: Falmer. Chaurus. Slaughterfish. Chaurus Hunter. Glow Sabre Cats.
Symptoms: Reduces Speech by 50%.
Threat Level: 1


And more to come.

Threat Levels:
1: A minor threat, but a cure should still be sought out.
2: A minor threat, this disease will hinder you in some small but noticeable way.
3: A medium threat, this disease will hinder combat but not outright cripple you.
4: A major threat, this disease will make most combat encounters nightmarish.
5: A major threat, this disease will most likely kill you if you don\'t find a cure very soon.
† effect is class specific, if the affected stats don\'t apply then treat it as a level 1 threat.

*  effect will be added/increased next version.
**  effect will be removed/reduced next version.
